channel.title: Attacking help
channel.description: Okay, when I wield a Godsword and have the weapon set on attack it swings the sword like normal, but when i switch to strength/block/slash and i attack something, it holds the sword and kicks the npc/player...but it hits high just like hitting with the sword...lol how do i fix this?

item.title: Attacking help
item.dc:creator: @the_chef the chef
item.description:
@the_chef wrote:

damn yeah i dont want to mess up the stance or anything… ahaha i just need to fix the str one

Read full topic

item.title: Attacking help
item.dc:creator: @My_name_is_anthony My name is anthony
item.description:
@My_name_is_anthony wrote:

It depends what server your using and thats a really easy thing to do, so its kinda scary you cant, but just change the emote for the godsword to the correct one and you might need to add the correct one to your client.

Read full topic
